WIZARDELEMENT.name: Family
WIZARDELEMENT.DESCRIPTION:
HCS12
M68HC12, HCS12 and HCS12X represent three generations of 16-bit controllers with all of them being derived from the industry standard M68HC11.

WIZARDELEMENT.name: HCS12VR
WIZARDELEMENT.DESCRIPTION:
HCS12VR Family
The S12VR family integrates an S12 microcontroller with a LIN Physical interface, a 5V regulator system to supply the microcontroller, and analog blocks to control other elements of the system which operate at vehicle battery level (e.g. relay drivers, high-side driver outputs, wake up inputs).
